message.body: Also I want to mention now since you had referenced it earlier, meeting with you twice next week is going to be nearly impossible for me since I have so much to do in that week. I can meet once, or course, and maybe you could meet with another tutor also if you'd like more input.

I've been studying for in class two finals to take tomorrow and trying to write 3 short essays also due tomorrow.. That combined with everything going on extracurricular wise made me go home and have a bit of a meltdown and totally forget our meeting. Sorry. I'm up now and studying again and understand if you're too busy

I am really sorry that you have so much at once and are so stressed! :( My thesis is due Friday so right now I need to go work on it. If it will help we could try to meet earlier next week rather than later.
Thanks and I'm so sorry I forgot. Too much going on right now! Well I don't want to inconvenience you so let me know. Good luck with your thesis
